transArray.content: The hotel is located around the community. The newly opened room facilities are quite new. The sheets and supplies in the room are clean and disinfected. The tables and floor tiles are carefully cleaned and spotless. The living environment is very comfortable and the service at the front desk is also very good. Very good value for money!
Dear guest, thank you for taking time out of your busy schedule to share your stay experience. You are a little man with a gentleness that is concealed by your publicity. I love you.
